name: Custom Component
description: Reusable ScriptComponent that can be attached to any entity
instructions:
CRITICAL: Use api_search to verify EVERY method you call. Never guess Enfusion API method names — they are non-standard and many obvious-sounding methods don't exist.
1. Use api_search to look up ScriptComponent and any classes your component interacts with — verify methods exist before using them
2. Edit the component script to add your member variables and logic — only call methods confirmed by api_search
3. Use [Attribute()] to expose configuration in Workbench
4. Override EOnInit for initialization, OnPostInit for post-setup — verify these exist on your parent class via api_search
5. Override OnDelete for cleanup
6. Attach the component to entity prefabs via their 'components' block
7. Access the component at runtime: entity.FindComponent(YourComponent)
